database.name: Ifla, Burning Inventor
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Lvl 1]Haste. Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste attacks an opponent, before damage calculation: Select a unit an enemy controls and deal 1 damage to it.

database.name: Ifla, Flaming Architect
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Lvl 2]Haste. Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste attacks an opponent, before damage calculation: Select a unit an enemy controls and deal 1 damage to it.

database.name: Ifla, Eden's Architect
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Lvl 3]Haste. Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste declares an attack: Create an attacking (3/3) "Fragile Machine" token with Haste.

database.name: Ifla, The World Architect
database.description: [Leader/Magician/Architect/Legend/Lvl 4]Haste. Once per turn, when a unit or leader you control with Haste declares an attack: Create attacking (3/3) "Fragile Machine" tokens with Haste equal to your opponents Life Cloth total left.

database.name: Rocket Goblin
database.description: [Goblin]Haste.

database.name: Sun Snake
database.description: [Animal]

database.name: Fireball
database.description: Target 1 unit. Deal 2 damage to it.

database.name: Dragon Knight of Hythe
database.description: [Dragon/Knight/Legend]When this unit deals combat damage to a player, deal 3 damage to every unit which is controlled by them. If this unit has Haste, Field Spells cannot be targetted by card effects, but destroy all Field Spells if this unit dies and heal this unit by 8 when your turn ends.

database.name: Storm Valley
database.description: [Field]Units you control have Haste. Once per turn, when you activate a spell or an ability which deals non-combat damage to a unit or player, you may decrease the Waiting Time of one of your units by 1.

database.name: Blazing Magic Enhancer
database.description: [Magician]Units with Haste you control gain (+1/+1).

database.name: Inexperienced Engineer
database.description: [Architect]When this unit enters the battlefield: You may discard a card, and if you do, select an enemy unit and deal 1 damage to it.

database.name: Explosive Cage
database.description: [Structure]Cannot attack. When another unit with Haste enters the battlefield under your control, deal 1 damage to this unit. When this unit is defeated: Deal 2 damage to every unit.

database.name: Builder Apprentice
database.description: [Architect]

database.name: Priest of the Living Light
database.description: [Cleric]When this unit enters the battlefield, you may choose another of your units. Select it and then heal it completely if it took damage, else deal 1 damage to it and grant it Haste. You may sacrifice this unit to grant another of your units Haste.

database.name: Guidance Dog
database.description: [Animal]Once per turn, if this unit has Haste, you may discard your entire hand to draw 1 card.

database.name: Pyro-Maniac
database.description: [Magician]Once per turn, when your leader attacks, give every allied unit with Haste (+1/+1) until the end of this turn.

database.name: Jadetwirl Revolutionary
database.description: [Architect]Once per turn, when a token would be created by one of your cards, you may create two of those tokens instead.

database.name: Cirrane Underground Fighter
database.description: [Fighter]Once per turn, if this is the only unit attacking this turn, give this unit (+1/+1) for every unit and leader with Haste you control.

database.name: Nimble Squirrel
database.description: [Animal]Flash. If this unit is flash summoned: You may select an enemy unit. If the selected unit attacks this turn, the damage it deals is dealt to this card instead.

database.name: Lance and Spear - TAG TEAM
database.description: [Fighter/TAG TEAM]If this unit is summoned to occupy a vertical space: It gains Haste. If this unit is summoned to occupy a horizontal space: This unit gains (+0/+4).

database.name: Blaze Constructor
database.description: [Architect]Once per turn, you may sacrifice an allied unit. If you do, select an enemy unit and deal damage equal to the sacrificed unit's remaining HP to it.

database.name: Meteor Mage
database.description: [Magician]Once per turn, if this unit has Haste and target opponent has Life Cloth left, you may sacrifice this unit to deal 1 damage to target opponent.

database.name: Rebuilder of Ruins
database.description: [Architect]Once per turn, if this unit has Haste, you may choose a number between 1 and 3 and select an opponent. Target opponent and you discard the selected amount of cards. For each card with cost 4 or less, deal 3 damage to every unit.

database.name: Hurry up!
database.description: Target allied unit gains Haste until the end of this turn. If it has been summoned this turn, reduce its Waiting Time to 0.

database.name: Metal Enhancement Mk I
database.description: Equip an allied unit. It gains (+2/+2). On your next Standby Phase, you may sacrifice the equipped unit and if you do, you may add a 'Metal Enhancement Mk II' from your Deck to your Hand.

database.name: Metal Enhancement Mk II
database.description: Equip an allied unit. It gains (+3/+3). On your next Standby Phase, you may sacrifice the equipped unit and if you do, select an enemy unit and deal damage equal to the equipped unit's STR to it.

database.name: The final battle
database.description: Double all of your unit's and leader's STR until the end of your turn. At the end of your turn, destroy all allied units, then you take damage equal to the amount of units destroyed by this effect.

database.name: Meteor Shower
database.description: Select all units individually and if you do, destroy the selected units.

database.name: Unfair Advantage
database.description: Select an attacking allied unit which is blocked by an enemy unit. Destroy the blocking unit. The attack is calculated as if there was no blocker. (Your opponent takes direct damage.)

database.name: Lady Spark
database.description: [Leader/Cosmos/Lvl 1]Once per turn, if one of your effects increases the Waiting Time of a unit, you may draw a card.

database.name: Lady Star
database.description: [Leader/Cosmos/Lvl 2]Once per turn, if one of your effects increases the Waiting Time of a unit, you may draw a card and if you do, select an enemy unit and increase its Waiting Time by 1.

database.name: Lady Galaxy
database.description: [Leader/Cosmos/Lvl 3]Once per turn, if one of your effects increases the Waiting Time of a unit, you may draw a card and if you do, select an enemy unit and double its Waiting Time.

database.name: Lady Universe
database.description: [Leader/Cosmos/Legend/Lvl 4]When this unit enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the combined Waiting Time of all units. Once per turn, if one of your effects increases the Waiting Time of a unit, its owner may draw cards equal to its Waiting Time.

database.name: Jolly Cosmonaut
database.description: [Cleric]When this unit enters the battlefield, select a unit and increase it's Waiting Time by 1.

database.name: Telescopist
database.description: [Cleric]Once per turn, if you draw an additional card, you may increase an allied unit's Waiting Time by 2. If you do, you may search your Deck for a purple spell with cost 3 or less.

database.name: Snow Owl
database.description: [Animal]Once per turn, if this unit has no Waiting Time, you may look at the top card of your deck.

database.name: Aurora Priestress
database.description: [Cleric]When this unit enters the battlefield, you may select a unit and if you do, heal allied units equal to the selected unit's Waiting Time.

database.name: Mana Gatherer
database.description: [Cleric]Every time you draw one or more additional cards, increase your Floating Mana by 1.

database.name: Dream Crawler
database.description: [Dream Creature]When this unit enters the battlefield, select an allied unit. Increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by 3. When the selected unit's Waiting Time is reduced to 0, destroy this unit.

database.name: Snow Elemental
database.description: [Elemental]When this card enters the battlefield, if you control a purple Field Spell: You may select an enemy unit and if you do, increase its Waiting Time by 1.

database.name: Banishment Doll
database.description: [Doll]Flash. When this cards enters the battlefield: You may select a card and if you do, exile it until its owner's next Standby Phase.

database.name: Guardian of Dreams
database.description: [Cleric]Dream Creatures you control cannot be destroyed by their own effects.

database.name: Dream Hands
database.description: [Dream Creature]When this unit enters the battlefield, select an allied unit. Increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by 3. When the selected unit's Waiting Time is reduced to 0, destroy this unit. Once per turn, when this unit deals combat damage to a player: You may sacrifice this unit and if you do, select a unit and increase its Waiting Time by 2.

database.name: Dream Accelerator
database.description: [Dream Creature]When this unit enters the battlefield, select an allied unit. Increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by 2. When the selected unit's Waiting Time is reduced to 0, destroy this unit. Once per turn, if this unit has no Waiting Time: You may select an allied unit and decrease its Waiting Time by 1.

database.name: Higher Mind Hierophant
database.description: [Cleric]Once per turn, when one of your card effects increase a unit's Waiting Time: You may half the Waiting Time added by the effect.

database.name: Dream Giant
database.description: [Dream Creature]When this unit enters the battlefield, select an allied unit. Increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by 3. When the selected unit's Waiting Time is reduced to 0, destroy this unit.

database.name: Calm Ghost and Time Guardian - TAG TEAM
database.description: [Ghost/Cleric/TAG TEAM]If this unit is summoned to occupy a vertical space: You may select an enemy unit with an active Waiting Time and if you do, deal damage to it equal to this unit's STR. If this unit is summoned to occupy a horizontal space: Increase the Waiting Time of all enemy units by 2.

database.name: Nightmare Scarecrow
database.description: [Fear]When this unit enters the battlefield, if you control a Dream Creature: You may sacrifice one of your Dream Creatures and if you do, increase the Waiting Time of all enemy units by 2.

database.name: Nightmare Pharynx
database.description: [Fear]When this unit enters the battlefield, if you control a Dream Creature: You may sacrifice one of your Dream Creatures and if you do, double this unit's STR.

database.name: Nightmare Ultimatum
database.description: [Fear/Legend]When this unit enters the battlefield, if you control a Dream Creature and a Fear: You may sacrifice one of your Dream Creatures and one of your other Fears and if you do, destroy all enemy units with an active Waiting Time. Then, if you activated this effect, increase all enemy units Waiting Time by 3.

database.name: Metal Chains
database.description: Select a unit and increase its Waiting Time by 1.

database.name: Dream Link
database.description: Give all units without an active Waiting Time (+X/+X), where X is the amount of units with an active Waiting Time until the end of this turn.

database.name: Hide and Seek
database.description: Select an allied unit and an enemy unit and banish them until the next Extension Phase.

database.name: Nap Time
database.description: Select an allied unit and increase its Waiting Time by 2. If you do, you may search your Deck for up to 1 Dream Creature and add it to your Hand.

database.name: Endless Sky
database.description: [Field]Whenever a unit enters the battlefield, increase its Waiting Time by 1. Once per turn, when one of your effects increases the Waiting Time of a unit, you may pay 2 and if you do, you may search your Deck for up to 1 purple Magic with a level equal or less the level of your Leader and add it to your hand.

database.name: Dream Transfer
database.description: Select a unit and reduce its Waiting Time to 0. If you do, you may select an enemy unit and if you do, increase the selected unit's Waiting Time by the amount of Waiting Time removed by this effect.

database.name: Sleeping Potion
database.description: Select a unit. Increase its Waiting Time by 2. If it was an attacking unit, it is no longer attacking. If it was a blocking unit, it is no longer blocking.

database.name: Dream Ritual
database.description: Increase the Waiting Time of all units by 2. Then, you may summon a purple unit from your Deck with cost equal or less the amount of units with an active Waiting Time.
